suite.name: 32 Add User Validations

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided URL.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Add invalid data in Customer Add form should Fail

arguments.arg: There were some errors: Company name is required Address is required Country is required City is required Zip is required Contact email is required Shipping address is required Shipping country is required Shipping city is required Shipping Zip is required

kw.name: Add invalid data in Customer Add form should Fail

arguments.arg: There were some errors: The address field it's invalid for taxes service: An exact street name match could not be found and phonetically matching the street name resulted in either no matches or matches to more than one street name. The address it's invalid for taxes service: Address cannot be geocoded.
